page.title: 18MR.KEARSLEY'S FARM
page.content: There are 15 to 20 farms in Billinge which between them cover 2,000 acres. Mr. Kearsley's farm is 200 years old and covers 15 acres, the land at Windy Arbour is 2 miles away. He has only one employee,his son.They have regular checks on their equipment by the government.He has only a dog for security bacause there is little vandalism. The soil is rich and grows good crops of barley,potatoes,swedes and carrots. He rotates the crops and has ditches and hedges to separate the fields.The crops are sold locally.The farmer uses manure and artificial fertiliser as well as insecticides. Mr. Kearsley can not take proper holidays, he has a few weekends a year Last year he qualified for the World Final Plouging Competition, which was held in Horncastle,Lincolnshire.
